product_name: Timex Timex Ironman Run X50 Heart Rate Monitor
long_description: This sleek watch and heart rate monitor connects wirelessly to your fitness apps so your data appears right on your wrist. It also controls your music so you can switch tunes without breaking stride.
short_description: This sleek watch and heart rate monitor connects wirelessly to your fitness apps so your data appears right on your wrist. It also controls your music so you can switch tunes without breaking stride.
